item.title: Yoga at Home
item.description: Think about your meal ahead. Spend time planning what you will eat, how youwill prepare it. Consciousness of our food creates mindful behaviors. When you eat, do you feel distracted? Are you in the midst of five other tasks?Putting aside time in your day to focus on your food, allows the body to absorbthe nutrients more efficiently. CHEW! Digestion begins in the mouth. The more time your food spends in yourmouth, the more signals are being sent to your brain and remainder of the digestive tract to begin the process of digestion.

item.title: Simple tricks for incorporating mindfulness into your day.
item.description: Although it may seem redundant to bring up the fact that the year 2020 has not positively exceeded any one persons expectations, we must go on. Going on does not mean dwelling in misery, it does not mean trudging on through the thick of the pandemic, and it also does not mean dismissing reality. We must be aware of the current situation, we must work together to keep one another safe, and the only way we can spread kindness is from within.
